reviews.sentence: Good hotel. I must say that this hotel is value for money. But the worth thing about this hotel was it is breakfast buffet. The items were very limited and not good. I evn complained the manager abt dis. Apart frm dis everything ws good. A staff Sukanta Panda was vry good nd wel behaved. Overal it ws a good hotel if u want a room around ₹250.

Good for business travellers. I was on a business travel and stayed here for 3 days. First thing that I missed which was not available in the hotel was the toiletries. This is so common and essential part of service provided by all the hotels. I was surprised to not find the same. I booked for a king size double bed room but I was supplied with a single bed room. When I enquired I was told that even if it shows on makemytrip its actually single bed for single person and double for 2 irrespective of my booking. It was weird. Breakfast was good and I wish they had a bigger area for the restaurant. It will serve them well if they can have a separate section and start a bar. The staff at the restaurant were nice. Sugestions1. Make your front desk people more welcoming. A gentle smile will not hurt them while greeting a new guest2. Need to have another lift3. Have a glass facade or closed area for the restaurant4. Please give toiletries. It will not cost you much but add a lot of value in your service5. Have better mattress.

Wonderful service and great place to stay. On my recent visit to Bhubaneswar on the 23th Jan what I experienced about Ginger hotel was some thing unique. Most courteous and humble staff at every level cleanliness quality of food was exceptional. Especially Papa Rao and Partha were to the best of there service.

Good exprience. i was 2 nights at ginger bhubneswar. good experience which i got especially house keeping guys are very good and helpful. breakfast is very limited. need to improve breakfast buffet and servicei will visit soon thanks to team ginger.

A value for money stay. My stay at Ginger Bhubaneswar was fantabulous. The Ginger chain has always been a benchmark in hospitality and customer friendliness. Here also the reception staff Ranjan and Riaz were very helpful and gave a wonderful service. The location of the hotel is in the heart of the city and I would recommend it to anyone who comes to Bhubaneswar. Thanks team.

Food taste. Hotel is located in main location and easier to identify. Food items are very limited but all are good in taste. Wi fi was not working properly. Overall a pretty decent hotel. Staff and service are OK.

Excellent service by Ginger hotel. Staff was friendly and corporate and Raj sharma also susant das very good service provider and prtwish. There is a lot of space of around parking for car. Food is good Great ambition and confer feeling.

Excellent service and hospitality Services and attention was excellent particularly fb Mr Abdul Raj Sharma Mr Abhisekh. Definitely will recommend for future programs. Food quality is good. Room ambience cleanliness punctuality of service is satisfactory.

Room Service. It was very good Experience in Ginger Bhubaneshwar. staff like Jyoti Ranjan and Sunkanta Mohanty are batter hostage regarding room Service I would like to request Restaurant Manager to try to keep one one item from North India in Break Fast Menu. This hotel has enough parking Space.

Best hotel. I stayed in this hotel with my grandson. it was very pleasant and very hospitable. my experience was very good. staffs good like soumya and sunita and dipti. in goa ginger I stayed very good staffs.

Slow Internet and Old AC. Reception Staff housekeeping staff were very polite and helful Breakfast was good Air Conditioner was very old air flow swings were damaged it pointed at the floor all the time Internet was very poor.
Average Stay. Hotel is good but only self service is available which is not so appreciated.
Need improvement. Traveled Vistara stayed Ginger. Both Tata product. Huge difference. Ginger needs a lot of improvement. Specifically BHUBANESWAR. Starting from front desk to stay to food everything.
Go for it to save time and money. A refreshing stay at a commendable price. Always providing something better than service hotel.
Excellent Stay. Nice hotel. It was a comfortable staybr AC is not working but service is good.
Sign of struggle evident everywhere. Brightly painted rooms carefree staffs and no one to even greet. It makes you feel like a haunted hotel from medieval period with modern furniture.
Worst stsy. I did not like the behaviour of staff. Facilities provided in the room were not working properly. After related request also no one was attending. Nothing.
Room service was not good. Rooms were not properly cleaned. Service is very badbr Rom Service was very bad Room was not cleaned properly. In extra bedding cots not provided.

Terrible experience. We were 3 adults and booked a single room. But the size of room was too small to put extra bed in that. Room was too small that after extra bed the other two person ca nt even go to was room or gate without removing that extra bed. If you do not have big rooms then why you take booking for 3 adults. If they had informed me about that I would have taken two room but this was pathetic service from Ginger. I stay in Ginger Hotel regularly but this was the worst experience I had in Ginger group of Hotel. I asked manager but he also refused to have big room in Hotel.

Rest room exhaust was not working after asking one of housekeeping staff said it work only in morning hrs was centrally operated. At morning after repeated phone calls to front desk no satisfactory response as they always promise to send maintenance guy.

Very bad experience. Worst property to stay other than location nothing good about this. We stayed in building which was under construction toilet was not clean flush did not work AC and kettle were really old. no door bell room had spots of spilled tea which was not clean restaurant did not pick calls reception staff was not well trained kept me standing with baby. Not Worth the price.
Not good In resturant the service is so poor.

it is quite disappointing to stay here till the time the renovations are done. It resembles a ghost town from inside. Service is good but the food options especially for dinner was pretty less and pricey for a budget hotel.

TLDR Great location not far from the highway to Kolkata Lots of parking space Slow check in Good ambiance lobby Average ambiance room hallways Slow and Irritating room service Expensive and average tasting food. The location of the hotel was brilliant for us as it was quite close to NH16 AH45. Lots of parking space with the added advantage of a well lit guarded compound. Check in process was surprisingly slow receptionist wanted details which could have easily been copied from the online booking made. Lobby is beautifully decorated. Rooms are compact as any other Ginger property. What was surprising is that the service was not great. The tea coffee set in our room was missing milk sachets and there was no door mat in front of the bathroom door both of these were brought 4 phone calls and two hours later. In room dining was below average in taste which was disappointing considering how expensive it was. The all you can eat breakfast was slightly better. do not order the dosa they are small in size may not be served piping hot in spite of being made to order surprisingly and not tasty at all.
Average Stay. Ginger hotel receptionist was not good AC was not working in lobby when we entered in hotel. Rooms were beautiful but beds were small. Food was delicious.
Good. Space a bit restrictive and room service not upto the mark.
